Package mmj.lang

Class ProofCompression

java.lang.Object
mmj.lang.ProofCompression
public class ProofCompression extends Object
ProofCompression provides Compression and Decompression Services for Metamath proofs as described in Metamath(dot)pdf at metamath(dot)org.

  • Method Details

    • decompress

      public ParseTree.RPNStep[] decompress(String theoremLabel, int seq, Map<String,Stmt> stmtTbl, Hyp[] mandHypArray, Hyp[] optHypArray, List<String> otherRefList, BlockList proofBlockList) throws LangException
      Decompress a single proof.
      Parameters:
      theoremLabel - Theorem's label, used in error messages that may be generated during processing.
      seq - the sequence number of the theorem
      stmtTbl - Stmt lookup map for translating labels into Stmt object references.
      mandHypArray - The theorem's MandFrame.hypArray.
      optHypArray - The theorem's OptFrame.optHypArray.
      otherRefList - List of String containing labels of Stmt's provided in the parenthesized portion of a compressed proof.
      proofBlockList - List of String containing the compressed portion of the proof.
      Returns:
      RPNStep array containing decompressed (but still "packed") Metamath RPN proof.
      Throws:
      LangException - if an error occurred

    • isProofStepInFrame

      public boolean isProofStepInFrame(Stmt proofStep, Hyp[] frame)
      Checks to see whether or not a proof step is contained in the given Frame.
      Parameters:
      proofStep - a Statement reference.
      frame - the frame to check
      Returns:
      true if proof step == a Hyp in the frame

    • isProofStepInExtendedFrame

      public boolean isProofStepInExtendedFrame(Stmt proofStep)
      Checks to see whether or not a proof step is contained in the Theorem's Extended Frame.

      Cloned this from mmj.lang.Theorem.java.

      First checks to see if the proof step is in the MandFrame's hypArray. If not it checks the OptFrame's hypArray

      Parameters:
      proofStep - a Statement reference.
      Returns:
      true if proof step == a Hyp in either the MandFrame or OptFrame of the Theorem.
